sentences.english: The second chapter questioned the ancient Greek's thoughts about heroes and women.
sentences.chinese: 第二章侧重于对古希腊人英雄观与女性观的质疑。

sentences.english: The top-down approach or sometimes known as the Economy-Industry-Company (EIC) model emphasises the market over the company.
sentences.chinese: 从上至下的方法侧重于整体市场。

sentences.english: A change in emphasis will be essential.
sentences.chinese: 侧重点的改变至关重要。

sentences.english: Third, our institutions must be effective and be focused on delivering results.
sentences.chinese: 第三，我们的机构必须具有效益并侧重于产生实效。

sentences.english: This paper centers on how to construct the consuming housing finance system.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究的住房金融体系侧重于消费性住房金融方面。

sentences.english: That school puts particular emphasis on arithmetic and reading.
sentences.chinese: 那所学校侧重算术和阅读。

sentences.english: Nowadays its keystone is to treat the police with true feelings.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段从优待警的侧重点是以情待警。

sentences.english: Huhne’s reforms, worked out in conjunction with the Treasury, focus on four areas.
sentences.chinese: 胡纳的改革，曾与财政部一起进行，侧重于四个领域。

sentences.english: Stresses manages the pattern reform to the person military institute the strategy exploration.
sentences.chinese: 侧重于人武学院管理模式改革的策略探索。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on basic research of hearing science and the clinical research of diagnostic audiology .
sentences.chinese: 本文侧重于基础听力学研究和诊断听力学的进展。

sentences.english: The developing direction and major project of biopesticides in China were suggested in the paper as well.
sentences.chinese: 并提出了我国发展生物农药的方向和侧重点。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the investigation on the self-access learning ability of non-English major freshmen.
sentences.chinese: 本文侧重调查非英语专业新生的英语自主性学习能力。

sentences.english: The emphasis is given to the denotational description of code generation languages.
sentences.chinese: 本文侧重讨论了代码生成语言的指称描述。

sentences.english: For-profit medical research is even more focused on servicing the needs of those with higher incomes.
sentences.chinese: 营利性医学研究更侧重于为那些高收入群体服务。

sentences.english: They angled their column towards modern young women.
sentences.chinese: 他们使其栏目侧重于现代年轻女性。

sentences.english: Research-map caters to the needs of specific research, while teaching-map served knowledge propoganda.
sentences.chinese: 科研地图面向专业科研，而教学地图侧重知识普及。

definition: to stress in a prejudiced way/to emphasize sth unduly
place of interest/a place one has one's eye on
to attend simultaneously to two or more things/to balance (career and family, family and education etc)
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
partial towards sth/to prefer/to incline/erroneous tendencies (Leftist or Revisionist deviation)
to incline to/to prefer/to be prone to
to consider/to give serious consideration to sth/consideration
important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
